ygData.subject: Re: Jaxan's and meditation
ygData.msgSnippet: Recently I had this same experience with a Ranger... who, when grouped with my party, insists on one of our bards singing Jaxa s Jig during her meditation.
ygData.messageBody:
Recently I had this same experience with a Ranger... who, when grouped with
my party, insists on one of our bards singing Jaxa's Jig during her
meditation. She claims it greatly speeds her mana regeneration.

Personally I think it's her imagination.


-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Simpson <gohorns@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 3:45 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Jaxan's and meditation


>From: "Andy Simpson" <gohorns@...>
>
>> From: Jim Mattson <jmattson@...>
>>
>> Recently, I was grouped with a necro who asked me to sing Jaxan's
>> while she
>> was meditating. She claimed to notice a *big* difference. Now, I've
seen
>> the discussions of how Jaxan's changes the meditation tick interval from
>> 8 seconds to 6 seconds, thereby increasing mana regeneration as a
>> side effect.
>> However, the druid I usually group with has said that she doesn't notice
>> any difference.
>
>All necros I've ever grouped with want me to play hymn of restoration and
>they claim it greatly helps their mana regen. All other mana users see no
>increase in mana regen no matter what song I play. Maybe this is a bug
that
>just affects Necros?
>
>Anthem Dirgemaker
>25th bard from Qeynos
>Solusek Ro
>Long Live Bristlebane!!
>
>
